description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/03905/LBC:  repairs and structural works (3) in respect of structural repair to the timber work of the building which includes remediation work to the roof structure and walls with maximum retention of existing timber, removal and replacement of rotten and wood worm infested timber, with remediation work to the masonry walls cracks to stabilise and restore structural integrity.
